userContentOne:
You must scan this job posting and provide me information about the following topics. Reminder: you will return a well formed JSON response as a return. 

{
    "job_title": String , // The title or designation of the job.
    "company": String, // The name of the company offering the job.
    "job_description": String, // A detailed description of the job role and responsibilities. Written in 4-6 paragraphs. Be verbose
    "job_posting_company_information": String , // Detailed information about the company, its mission, and operations. Written in 4-6 paragraphs. Be verbose
    "job_responsibilities": Collection of Strings [ // A list of tasks and responsibilities associated with the job.
      "Manage and assign Adobe licenses and subscriptions to the users.",
      "...",
      "Identify new opportunities and use cases for applying AI/ML to marketing and customer experience challenges."
    ],
    "job_requirements": Collection of Strings [ // A list of necessary qualifications, experiences, and skills required to perform the job.
      "Bachelor's degree in marketing, computer science, or related field.",
      "...",
      "Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment."
    ],
    "job_skills": Collection of Strings[ // A list of specific skills and competencies required for the job.
      "Marketing technologies",
      "Adobe Cloud products",
      "...",
      "Communication skills"
    ],
    "is_ai": Boolean, // Indicates if the job is related to AI (Artificial Intelligence).
    "is_genAi": Boolean, // Indicates if the job is related to generative AI.
    "is_Ai_justification":  String , // Explanation or justification of how the job is related to AI. We need to have a clear explanation of why is_ai value is set to True or False
    "job_salary": String, // The salary range offered for the job. Given as a string, like 130,000 - 180,000
    "job_keywords": Collection of Strings [ // Keywords related to the job that might be used for search or categorization.
      "Lead Product Manager",
      "Adobe Digital Cloud",
      "...",
      "AI/ML Marketing Solutions"
    ],
    "salary_low": integer, // The lower end of the salary range. Null if salary information is not found. 
    "salary_midpoint": integer, // The midpoint of the salary range. Null if salary information is not found.
    "salary_high": integer, // The higher end of the salary range. Null if salary information is not found.
    "city": String, // The city where the job is located, if applicable. Null if location information is not found.
    "state": String, // The state where the job is located, if applicable. Null if location information is not found.
    "work_location_type": String // The type of work location, e.g., remote, onsite, hybrid. This will always have a value. Roles that are hybrid or onsite will often say that in the posting. Otherwise, we assume remote. 
  }
  

These items will be given as a collection:
job_responsibilities
job_requirements
job_skills
job_keywords

Make sure you complete all of the fields. Make sure you provide a clear justification if a job is an AI (Artificial Intelligence) Job. Please process this information and await further instructions.
userContentTwo:
"About Lumen

Lumen is guided by our belief that humanity is at its best when technology advances the way we live and work. With 450,000 route fiber miles serving customers in more than 60 countries, we deliver the fastest, most secure global platform for applications and data to help businesses, government and communities deliver amazing experiences. Learn more about Lumen’s network, edge cloud, security and communication and collaboration solutions and our purpose to further human progress through technology at news.lumen.com, LinkedIn: /lumentechnologies, Twitter: @lumentechco, Facebook: /lumentechnologies, Instagram: @lumentechnologies and YouTube: /lumentechnologies.

The Role

The Lumen marketing operations team is looking for a Lead Product Manager for the Adobe Digital Cloud/Creative Cloud. As the Lead Product Manager this person is responsible for managing and maintaining some pieces within the Adobe stack: licenses and applications for the organization. They will ensure that the users have access to the appropriate tools and services and troubleshoots any issues that may arise. The administrator will also monitor the usage and performance of the Adobe products and provide training and support to the users.

The Main Responsibilities


 * Manage and assign Adobe licenses and subscriptions to the users.
 * Provide technical assistance and resolve any issues related to Adobe products and services.
 * Monitor and report on the usage and performance of Adobe products and services.
 * Ensure compliance with Adobe's terms and conditions and security policies.
 * Provide training and guidance to the users on how to use Adobe products and services effectively.
   
   

In addition to the above responsibilities, you will be responsible for leading and delivering innovative solutions that leverage artificial intelligence and machine learning to optimize marketing performance. You will work closely with internal marketing teams to understand their business goals, challenges, and data sources, and design and implement tailored AI/ML solutions that drive measurable results.


 * Manage the end-to-end delivery of AI/ML marketing solutions, from scoping and planning to deployment and evaluation.
 * Collaborate with data scientists, engineers, and developers to create and deploy scalable and robust AI/ML models and applications.
 * Communicate effectively with stakeholders, translating complex technical concepts into clear and actionable insights and recommendations.
 * Provide thought leadership and best practices on AI/ML marketing solutions, staying abreast of the latest trends and developments in the field.
 * Identify new opportunities and use cases for applying AI/ML to marketing and customer experience challenges.
   
   

What We Look For In a Candidate


 * Bachelor's degree in marketing, computer science, or related field.
 * At least 3 years of experience in marketing technologies, preferably with Adobe Cloud products or similar platforms.
 * Strong knowledge of artificial intelligence and machine learning concepts and applications.
 * Knowledge of Adobe Creative Cloud and Digital Cloud administration tools, such as the Admin Console, the Creative Cloud Desktop app, the Creative Cloud Packager, etc.
 * Knowledge of the Salesforce.com chat functionality and the bot capabilities contained within
 * Excellent analytical, troubleshooting, problem-solving, and communication skills.
 * Creative, innovative, and customer-oriented mindset.
 * Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
   
   

Requisition #: 331451

When applying for a position, you may be subject to a background screen (criminal records check, motor vehicle report, and/or drug screen), depending on the requirements for the position. More information on what’s included in these checks can be found in the Post Offer section of our FAQ page. Job-related concerns noted in the background screen may disqualify you from the new position or your current role. Background results will be evaluated on a case-by-case basis.

EEO Statement

We are committed to providing equal employment opportunities to all persons regardless of race, color, ancestry, citizenship, national origin, religion, veteran status, disability, genetic characteristic or information, age, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, family status, pregnancy, or other legally protected status (collectively, “protected statuses”). We do not tolerate unlawful discrimination in any employment decisions, including recruiting, hiring, compensation, promotion, benefits, discipline, termination, job assignments or training.

NOTE: Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.

Disclaimer

The above job definition information has been designed to indicate the general nature and level of work performed by employees within this classification. It is not designed to contain or be interpreted as a comprehensive inventory of all duties, responsibilities, and qualifications required of employees assigned to this job. Job duties and responsibilities are subject to change based on changing business needs and conditions.

Salary Range

Salary Min

80510

Salary Max

116513

This information reflects the anticipated base salary range for this position based on current national data. Minimums and maximums may vary based on location. Individual pay is based on skills, experience and other relevant factors.

This position is eligible for either short-term incentives or sales compensation. Director and VP positions also are eligible for long-term incentive. To learn more about our bonus structure, you can view additional information here. We're able to answer any additional questions you may have as you move through the selection process.

As part of our comprehensive benefits package, Lumen offers a broad range of Health, Life, Voluntary Lifestyle and other benefits and perks that enhance your physical, mental, emotional and financial wellbeing. You can learn more by clicking here.

Note: For union-represented postings, wage rates and ranges are governed by applicable collective bargaining agreement provisions."
